name: Aegis of the Gods
oracle_text: You have hexproof. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor_text: Athreos cares little for the other gods' conflict with mortals. He is concerned only with safe passage for the dead.

name: Ajani's Presence
oracle_text: Strive — Ajani's Presence costs {2}{W} more to cast for each target beyond the first.
Any number of target creatures each get +1/+1 and gain indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them.)

name: Akroan Mastiff
oracle_text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
flavor_text: Even when many of the soldiers who guarded Akros were called away, its safety was never in doubt.

name: Armament of Nyx
oracle_text: Enchant creature

Enchanted creature has double strike as long as it's an enchantment. Otherwise, prevent all damage that would be dealt by enchanted creature. (A creature with double strike deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

name: Banishing Light
oracle_text: When Banishing Light enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Banishing Light leaves the battlefield. (That permanent returns under its owner's control.)

name: Dawnbringer Charioteers
oracle_text: Flying, lifelink
Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Dawnbringer Charioteers, put a +1/+1 counter on Dawnbringer Charioteers.
flavor_text: "Nyx may belong to the gods, but the skies of Theros are ours."

name: Deicide
oracle_text: Exile target enchantment. If the exiled card is a God card, search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with the same name as that card and exile them, then that player shuffles his or her library.
flavor_text:
"It is done."
—Elspeth

name: Dictate of Heliod
oracle_text: Flash
Creatures you control get +2/+2.
flavor_text:
"In our war Heliod gave mortals some favor, yet other times he withheld aid. Are we still no more than game pieces to him?"
—Polyxene the Doubter

name: Eagle of the Watch
oracle_text: Flying, vigilance
flavor_text:
"Even from miles away, I could see our eagles circling. That's when I gave the command to pick up the pace. I knew we were needed at home."
—Kanlos, Akroan captain

name: Eidolon of Rhetoric
oracle_text: Each player can't cast more than one spell each turn.
flavor_text: It is the soul of a philosopher who died of starvation contemplating the universe.

name: Font of Vigor
oracle_text: {2}{W}, Sacrifice Font of Vigor: You gain 7 life.
flavor_text: Drink deep, and be restored.

name: Godsend
oracle_text: Equipped creature gets +3/+3.
Whenever equipped creature blocks or becomes blocked by one or more creatures, you may exile one of those creatures.
Opponents can't cast cards with the same name as cards exiled with Godsend.
Equip {3}

name: Harvestguard Alseids
oracle_text: Constellation — Whenever Harvestguard Alseids or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, prevent all damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.
flavor_text: Not all shields are forged of iron or bronze.

name: Lagonna-Band Trailblazer
oracle_text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Lagonna-Band Trailblazer, put a +1/+1 counter on Lagonna-Band Trailblazer.
flavor_text: Go forth with honor, return with glory.

name: Launch the Fleet
oracle_text: Strive — Launch the Fleet costs {1} more to cast for each target beyond the first.
Until end of turn, any number of target creatures each gain "Whenever this creature attacks, put a 1/1 white Soldier creature token onto the battlefield tapped and attacking."

name: Leonin Iconoclast
oracle_text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Leonin Iconoclast, destroy target enchantment creature an opponent controls.
flavor_text: "The stars belong in the night sky. This is our world, and we are our own masters."

name: Mortal Obstinacy
oracle_text: Enchant creature you control
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, you may sacrifice Mortal Obstinacy. If you do, destroy target enchantment.

name: Nyx-Fleece Ram
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: The gods are fascinated by innocence, perhaps because it's a quality they themselves lack.

name: Oppressive Rays
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block unless its controller pays {3}.
Activated abilities of enchanted creature cost {3} more to activate.

name: Oreskos Swiftclaw
flavor_text:
After the Battle of Pharagax Bridge, the Champion spent many months among the leonin of Oreskos. She found that they were quick to take offense, not because they were thin-skinned, but because they were always eager for a fight.
—The Theriad

name: Phalanx Formation
oracle_text: Strive — Phalanx Formation costs {1}{W} more to cast for each target beyond the first.
Any number of target creatures each gain double strike until end of turn. (They deal both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

name: Quarry Colossus
oracle_text: When Quarry Colossus enters the battlefield, put target creature into its owner's library just beneath the top X cards of that library, where X is the number of Plains you control.

name: Reprisal
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater. It can't be regenerated.
flavor_text:
"A tiny flame is enough to dispel the night."
—Elspeth

name: Sightless Brawler
oracle_text: Bestow {4}{W} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Sightless Brawler can't attack alone.
Enchanted creature gets +3/+2 and can't attack alone.

name: Skybind
oracle_text: Constellation — Whenever Skybind or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, exile target nonenchantment permanent. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

name: Skyspear Cavalry
oracle_text: Flying
Double strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
flavor_text: Pray her spear reaches you first. Her griffin is less kind.

name: Stonewise Fortifier
oracle_text: {4}{W}: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Stonewise Fortifier by target creature this turn.
flavor_text: Ephara taught some mortals to feel every vein in marble as though it flows with their own blood.

name: Supply-Line Cranes
oracle_text: Flying
When Supply-Line Cranes enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
flavor_text: They are trained from hatching to deliver aid where it is needed most.

name: Tethmos High Priest
oracle_text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Tethmos High Priest, return target creature card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor_text: "Death is tyranny. Like all tyranny, it must be opposed."

name: Aerial Formation
oracle_text: Strive — Aerial Formation costs {2}{U} more to cast for each target beyond the first.
Any number of target creatures each get +1/+1 and gain flying until end of turn.

name: Battlefield Thaumaturge
oracle_text: Each instant and sorcery spell you cast costs {1} less to cast for each creature it targets.
Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Battlefield Thaumaturge, Battlefield Thaumaturge gains hexproof until end of turn.

name: Cloaked Siren
oracle_text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Flying
flavor_text:
"That is not the voice of the wind singing on the stones."
—Callaphe the mariner

name: Countermand
oracle_text: Counter target spell. Its controller puts the top four cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
flavor_text: The physical pain was nothing compared to the agony in his mind.

name: Crystalline Nautilus
oracle_text: Bestow {3}{U}{U} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
When Crystalline Nautilus becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.
Enchanted creature gets +4/+4 and has "When this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it."

name: Dakra Mystic
oracle_text: {U}, {T}: Each player reveals the top card of his or her library. You may put the revealed cards into their owners' graveyards. If you don't, each player draws a card.
flavor_text: Choices are rarely as simple as they seem.

name: Daring Thief
oracle_text: Inspired — Whenever Daring Thief becomes untapped, you may exchange control of target nonland permanent you control and target permanent an opponent controls that shares a card type with it.
flavor_text: Honesty is the first casualty of war.

name: Dictate of Kruphix
oracle_text: Flash
At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player draws an additional card.
flavor_text: "Knowledge is cruel. It will break your heart and test your allegiances. Are you certain you want this curse?"

name: Font of Fortunes
oracle_text: {1}{U}, Sacrifice Font of Fortunes: Draw two cards.
flavor_text: Drink deep, and your thoughts will flow freely.

name: Godhunter Octopus
oracle_text: Godhunter Octopus can't attack unless defending player controls an enchantment or an enchanted permanent.
flavor_text:
"I will match Thassa drop for drop and show a god what true power is."
—Kiora

name: Hour of Need
oracle_text: Strive — Hour of Need costs {1}{U} more to cast for each target beyond the first.
Exile any number of target creatures. For each creature exiled this way, its controller puts a 4/4 blue Sphinx creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

name: Hubris
oracle_text: Return target creature and all Auras attached to it to their owners' hands.
flavor_text:
"You wish to learn of Nyx? Very well."
—Phenax, god of deception

name: Hypnotic Siren
oracle_text: Bestow {5}{U}{U} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Flying
You control enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has flying.

name: Interpret the Signs
oracle_text: Scry 3, then reveal the top card of your library. Draw cards equal to that card's converted mana cost. (To scry 3, look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

name: Kiora's Dismissal
oracle_text: Strive — Kiora's Dismissal costs {U} more to cast for each target beyond the first.
Return any number of target enchantments to their owners' hands.

name: Pin to the Earth
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -6/-0.
flavor_text:
"Mortal strength, like mortal hope, is so easily crushed."
—Thassa, god of the sea

name: Polymorphous Rush
oracle_text: Strive — Polymorphous Rush costs {1}{U} more to cast for each target beyond the first.
Choose a creature on the battlefield. Any number of target creatures you control each become a copy of that creature until end of turn.

name: Pull from the Deep
oracle_text: Return up to one target instant card and up to one target sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Pull from the Deep.
flavor_text: Ideas, not stones, form the true foundation of Meletis.

name: Riptide Chimera
oracle_text: Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, return an enchantment you control to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"I want one."
—Kiora

name: Rise of Eagles
oracle_text: Put two 2/2 blue Bird enchantment creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor_text: An offering to the sea brings an insight from the stars.

name: Sage of Hours
oracle_text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Sage of Hours, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Remove all +1/+1 counters from Sage of Hours: For each five counters removed this way, take an extra turn after this one.

name: Scourge of Fleets
oracle_text: When Scourge of Fleets enters the battlefield, return each creature your opponents control with toughness X or less to its owner's hand, where X is the number of Islands you control.

name: Sigiled Starfish
oracle_text: {T}: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor_text: Kruphix hid the most dire prophecies about humankind where humans would never find them and tritons wouldn't care to read them.

name: Thassa's Devourer
oracle_text: Constellation — Whenever Thassa's Devourer or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
flavor_text: When mortals claim there are places Thassa cannot reach, the sea god laughs.

name: Thassa's Ire
oracle_text: {3}{U}: You may tap or untap target creature.
flavor_text: The sailor had never seen a god before. Now she had gazed upon Thassa. Shortly she would see Athreos, and then she would meet Erebos.

name: Triton Cavalry
oracle_text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Triton Cavalry, you may return target enchantment to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: The tritons broke the surface, and the Nyxborn broke ranks.

name: Triton Shorestalker
oracle_text: Triton Shorestalker can't be blocked.
flavor_text: "Who will miss you, drywalker? A wife? A child? Perhaps they will blame the sea for your fate, and teach future generations to stay far away from it."

name: War-Wing Siren
oracle_text: Flying
Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets War-Wing Siren, put a +1/+1 counter on War-Wing Siren.
flavor_text: Once she sang sailors to their doom. Now she leads them to glory.

name: Whitewater Naiads
oracle_text: Constellation — Whenever Whitewater Naiads or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, target creature can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text: Stand against the crash of the river's rapids and you will know the power of the naiads.

name: Agent of Erebos
oracle_text: Constellation — Whenever Agent of Erebos or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, exile all cards from target player's graveyard.
flavor_text: Erebos's minions hunt the Returned and warn those who consider the same folly.

name: Aspect of Gorgon
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+3 and has deathtouch. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor_text:
"My adopted children are loved no less."
—Pharika, god of affliction

name: Bloodcrazed Hoplite
oracle_text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Bloodcrazed Hoplite, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Whenever a +1/+1 counter is placed on Bloodcrazed Hoplite, remove a +1/+1 counter from target creature an opponent controls.

name: Brain Maggot
oracle_text: When Brain Maggot enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals his or her hand and you choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card until Brain Maggot leaves the battlefield.

name: Cast into Darkness
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -2/-0 and can't block.
flavor_text: In desperation the soldier prayed to Phenax, begging for the power to cheat the gorgon's gaze.

name: Cruel Feeding
oracle_text: Strive — Cruel Feeding costs {2}{B} more to cast for each target beyond the first.
Any number of target creatures each get +1/+0 and gain lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by a creature with lifelink also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

name: Dictate of Erebos
oracle_text: Flash
Whenever a creature you control dies, each opponent sacrifices a creature.
flavor_text: "I take no pleasure in your suffering, but it is necessary. Once you accept your fate you'll find eternity more tolerable."

name: Doomwake Giant
oracle_text: Constellation — Whenever Doomwake Giant or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Crippling fear precedes it. A foul stench accompanies it. Death follows in its wake.

name: Dreadbringer Lampads
oracle_text: Constellation — Whenever Dreadbringer Lampads or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, target creature gains intimidate until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)

name: Extinguish All Hope
oracle_text: Destroy all nonenchantment creatures.
flavor_text: Phenax offers the hope of life, while Pharika grants the solace of death. Between them stands Erebos, who promises nothing but eternity.

name: Feast of Dreams
oracle_text: Destroy target enchanted creature or enchantment creature.
flavor_text: "We gave the gods the power to war against us. It is time we took that power back."

name: Felhide Petrifier
oracle_text: Deathtouch
Other Minotaur creatures you control have deathtouch.
flavor_text: It's common practice among minotaurs to collect the heads of their victims as trophies. Sometimes the trophies prove more than ornamental.

name: Font of Return
oracle_text: {3}{B}, Sacrifice Font of Return: Return up to three target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Drink deep, and death will recoil from you.

name: Gnarled Scarhide
oracle_text: Bestow {3}{B} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Gnarled Scarhide can't block.
Enchanted creature gets +2/+1 and can't block.

name: Grim Guardian
oracle_text: Constellation — Whenever Grim Guardian or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, each opponent loses 1 life.
flavor_text: Occasionally the living wander to the Rivers, but the wardens of Athreos ensure that only the dead pass.

name: King Macar, the Gold-Cursed
oracle_text: Inspired — Whenever King Macar, the Gold-Cursed becomes untapped, you may exile target creature. If you do, put a colorless artifact token named Gold onto the battlefield. It has "Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

name: Master of the Feast
oracle_text: Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent draws a card.
flavor_text: Any pleasure, when taken to excess, becomes torment. It's a formula that demons have perfected.

name: Nightmarish End
oracle_text: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your hand.
flavor_text:
"To think some believe it peaceful to die in one's sleep."
—Ashiok, Nightmare Weaver

name: Nyx Infusion
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 as long as it's an enchantment. Otherwise, it gets -2/-2.
flavor_text: A balm or a poison depending on how it is administered, and to whom.

name: Pharika's Chosen
oracle_text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor_text: The serpents' dens built into statues of Pharika serve not only to consecrate her temples, but as a hidden line of defense.

name: Returned Reveler
oracle_text: When Returned Reveler dies, each player puts the top three cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
flavor_text: The flesh is dead and the life forgotten, but old habits persist.

name: Ritual of the Returned
oracle_text: Exile target creature card from your graveyard. Put a black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield. Its power is equal to that card's power and its toughness is equal to that card's toughness.
flavor_text: A mask forged to avenge a death forgotten.

name: Rotted Hulk
flavor_text:
The hulk rose from the sea and loomed over the Champion. Pinned beneath the twisting, rotted planks of wood was the body of Kaliaros, the helmsman of her former crew, and beside him the captain, Photine.
—The Theriad

name: Silence the Believers
oracle_text: Strive — Silence the Believers costs {2}{B} more to cast for each target beyond the first.
Exile any number of target creatures and all Auras attached to them.

name: Spiteful Blow
oracle_text: Destroy target creature and target land.
flavor_text:
"Only a fool takes Phenax at his word. What do you expect from a god born of lies and betrayal?"
—Verenes, priest of Iroas

name: Squelching Leeches
oracle_text: Squelching Leeches's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Swamps you control.
flavor_text: Leeches are sacred to followers of Pharika for drawing poison from a wound, but feared by everyone else for drawing blood from the flesh.

name: Thoughtrender Lamia
oracle_text: Constellation — Whenever Thoughtrender Lamia or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, each opponent discards a card.
flavor_text: Some predators can sense fear in their prey, but the lamia is drawn to madness.

name: Tormented Thoughts
oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast Tormented Thoughts, sacrifice a creature.
Target player discards a number of cards equal to the sacrificed creature's power.
flavor_text:
"Not all nightmares can be escaped by waking."
—Ashiok, Nightmare Weaver

name: Worst Fears
oracle_text: You control target player during that player's next turn. Exile Worst Fears. (You see all cards that player could see and make all decisions for the player.)
flavor_text: Elspeth feared that her trespass into Nyx would not go unanswered.

name: Akroan Line Breaker
oracle_text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Akroan Line Breaker, Akroan Line Breaker gets +2/+0 and gains intimidate until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)
flavor_text: The enemies' shields are the first to shatter, and their battle line is never far behind.

name: Bearer of the Heavens
oracle_text: When Bearer of the Heavens dies, destroy all permanents at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor_text: To hold the heavens from the earth is no curse, but a titanic responsibility.

name: Bladetusk Boar
oracle_text: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)
flavor_text: Deathbellow Canyon is home to minotaurs and many other creatures that share a love for the taste of human flesh.

name: Blinding Flare
oracle_text: Strive — Blinding Flare costs {R} more to cast for each target beyond the first.
Any number of target creatures can't block this turn.

name: Cyclops of Eternal Fury
oracle_text: Creatures you control have haste.
flavor_text:
"The anger that festers inside this one is contagious."
—Anthousa of Setessa

name: Dictate of the Twin Gods
oracle_text: Flash
If a source would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals double that damage to that permanent or player instead.
flavor_text: Iroas and Mogis are as different in appearance as they are in personality.

name: Eidolon of the Great Revel
oracle_text: Whenever a player casts a spell with converted mana cost 3 or less, Eidolon of the Great Revel deals 2 damage to that player.
flavor_text: Xenagos reveled while Theros burned.

name: Flamespeaker's Will
oracle_text: Enchant creature you control
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, you may sacrifice Flamespeaker's Will. If you do, destroy target artifact.

name: Flurry of Horns
oracle_text: Put two 2/3 red Minotaur creature tokens with haste onto the battlefield.
flavor_text: A minotaur does not distinguish between human, satyr, and triton. They are all meat.

name: Font of Ire
oracle_text: {3}{R}, Sacrifice Font of Ire: Font of Ire deals 5 damage to target player.
flavor_text: Drink deep, and find your vengeance fulfilled.

name: Forgeborn Oreads
oracle_text: Constellation — Whenever Forgeborn Oreads or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, Forgeborn Oreads deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
flavor_text: Purphoros shaped the oreads out of stray coals from his forge.

name: Gluttonous Cyclops
oracle_text: {5}{R}{R}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
flavor_text: The cyclops had learned to never eat a shepherd. Instead he gently flung the "pit" aside to grow a new flock.

name: Harness by Force
oracle_text: Strive — Harness by Force costs {2}{R} more to cast for each target beyond the first.
Gain control of any number of target creatures until end of turn. Untap those creatures. They gain haste until end of turn.

name: Knowledge and Power
oracle_text: Whenever you scry, you may pay {2}. If you do, Knowledge and Power deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
flavor_text:
"Information is a powerful weapon."
—Cymede, queen of Akros

name: Lightning Diadem
oracle_text: Enchant creature
When Lightning Diadem enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
flavor_text: "I fight for Keranos and for mortals. I see no contradiction."

name: Magma Spray
oracle_text: Magma Spray deals 2 damage to target creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor_text: The ancient dragon Thraxes sleeps in Purphoros's sacred peak. When he stirs in dreams, so does the mountain.

name: Mogis's Warhound
oracle_text: Bestow {2}{R} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Mogis's Warhound attacks each turn if able.
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and attacks each turn if able.

name: Pensive Minotaur
flavor_text:
The Champion and her companions marched through the night, but the battle was over before they arrived. In the middle of the carnage sat a solitary minotaur, lost in what seemed to the Champion to be thought.
—The Theriad

name: Prophetic Flamespeaker
oracle_text: Double strike, trample
Whenever Prophetic Flamespeaker deals combat damage to a player, exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn.
flavor_text: Fire to destroy. Fire to create.

name: Riddle of Lightning
oracle_text: Choose target creature or player. Scry 3, then reveal the top card of your library. Riddle of Lightning deals damage equal to that card's converted mana cost to that creature or player. (To scry 3, look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

name: Rollick of Abandon
oracle_text: All creatures get +2/-2 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Embrace every moment, for it could be your last."
—Xenagos, god of revels

name: Rouse the Mob
oracle_text: Strive — Rouse the Mob costs {2}{R} more to cast for each target beyond the first.
Any number of target creatures each get +2/+0 and gain trample until end of turn.

name: Satyr Hoplite
oracle_text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Satyr Hoplite, put a +1/+1 counter on Satyr Hoplite.
flavor_text: "Xenagos has become what he once despised: a tyrant and an oppressor."

name: Sigiled Skink
oracle_text: Whenever Sigiled Skink attacks, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor_text: The runes seem to come alive as it moves, rippling like slow flames across its scales.

name: Spawn of Thraxes
oracle_text: Flying
When Spawn of Thraxes enters the battlefield, it deals damage to target creature or player equal to the number of Mountains you control.
flavor_text: Sparks from Purphoros's forge fill the belly of every dragon.

name: Spite of Mogis
oracle_text: Spite of Mogis deals damage to target creature equal to the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

name: Starfall
oracle_text: Starfall deals 3 damage to target creature. If that creature is an enchantment, Starfall deals 3 damage to that creature's controller.
flavor_text:
"The most brilliant stars are not born of Nyx."
—Rhexenor, Akroan flamespeaker

name: Twinflame
oracle_text: Strive — Twinflame costs {2}{R} more to cast for each target beyond the first.

Choose any number of target creatures you control. For each of them, put a token that's a copy of that creature onto the battlefield. Those tokens have haste. Exile them at the beginning of the next end step.

name: Wildfire Cerberus
oracle_text: {5}{R}{R}: Monstrosity 1. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes monstrous.)
When Wildfire Cerberus becomes monstrous, it deals 2 damage to each opponent and each creature your opponents control.

name: Bassara Tower Archer
oracle_text: Hexproof, reach
flavor_text: Setessan warriors of Bassara Tower are known for their guerrilla tactics and skill with the bow. Interlopers into the Nessian Wood do not get far.

name: Colossal Heroics
oracle_text: Strive — Colossal Heroics costs {1}{G} more to cast for each target beyond the first.
Any number of target creatures each get +2/+2 until end of turn. Untap those creatures.

name: Consign to Dust
oracle_text: Strive — Consign to Dust costs {2}{G} more to cast for each target beyond the first.
Destroy any number of target artifacts and/or enchantments.

name: Desecration Plague
oracle_text: Destroy target enchantment or land.
flavor_text:
"The gods think of us as insects. Perhaps there is wisdom in that."
—Perisophia the philosopher

name: Dictate of Karametra
oracle_text: Flash
Whenever a player taps a land for mana, that player adds one mana to his or her mana pool of any type that land produced.
flavor_text: "I refuse to let the folly of mortals endanger the home I made for them."

name: Eidolon of Blossoms
oracle_text: Constellation — Whenever Eidolon of Blossoms or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.
flavor_text: The emotional echoes of dryad gatherings attract lost souls.

name: Font of Fertility
oracle_text: {1}{G}, Sacrifice Font of Fertility: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: Drink deep, and know the path to the heart of the wilds.

name: Golden Hind
oracle_text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
flavor_text:
"It is not yours to hunt, mortal. Be content with its beauty alone."
—Nylea, god of the hunt

name: Goldenhide Ox
oracle_text: Constellation — Whenever Goldenhide Ox or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, target creature must be blocked this turn if able.
flavor_text: The temptation to take the ox's golden hide is as irresistible as it is fatal.

name: Heroes' Bane
oracle_text: Heroes' Bane enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it.
{2}{G}{G}: Put X +1/+1 counters on Heroes' Bane, where X is its power.
flavor_text: Travelers' tales claim that hydras bite off their own heads to make themselves deadlier.

name: Humbler of Mortals
oracle_text: Constellation — Whenever Humbler of Mortals or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control gain trample until end of turn.
flavor_text: The anger of the gods multiplied in Nyx, and the land awoke in dark echoes of their rage.

name: Hydra Broodmaster
oracle_text: {X}{X}{G}: Monstrosity X. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put X +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
When Hydra Broodmaster becomes monstrous, put X X/X green Hydra creature tokens onto the battlefield.

name: Kruphix's Insight
oracle_text: Reveal the top six cards of your library. Put up to three enchantment cards from among them into your hand and the rest of the revealed cards into your graveyard.
flavor_text: The horizon is tantalizing in both its uncertainty and its potential.

name: Market Festival
oracle_text: Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds two mana in any combination of colors to his or her mana pool (in addition to the mana the land produces).
flavor_text: Commerce is always the basis for peace.

name: Nature's Panoply
oracle_text: Strive — Nature's Panoply costs {2}{G} more to cast for each target beyond the first.
Choose any number of target creatures. Put a +1/+1 counter on each of them.
flavor_text: Nature protects its own.

name: Nessian Game Warden
oracle_text: When Nessian Game Warden enters the battlefield, look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of Forests you control. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

name: Oakheart Dryads
oracle_text: Constellation — Whenever Oakheart Dryads or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"I do not know if the forest was different after they passed. But I know I was."
—Ianthe, Setessan hunter

name: Pheres-Band Thunderhoof
oracle_text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Pheres-Band Thunderhoof, put two +1/+1 counters on Pheres-Band Thunderhoof.
flavor_text: "Flesh and bone or star and shadow. It makes no difference to my club."

name: Pheres-Band Warchief
oracle_text: Vigilance, trample
Other Centaur creatures you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance and trample.
flavor_text: The renowned warchiefs of Pheres Band fight with the might of minotaurs and the sagacity of sphinxes.

name: Ravenous Leucrocota
oracle_text: Vigilance
{6}{G}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
flavor_text: Hunger makes a leucrocota dangerous. A full belly makes it angry and dangerous.

name: Renowned Weaver
oracle_text: {1}{G}, Sacrifice Renowned Weaver: Put a 1/3 green Spider enchantment creature token with reach onto the battlefield. (It can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text: "You think your weaving as beautiful as mine? Let me show you the true meaning of the craft."

name: Reviving Melody
oracle_text: Choose one or both —
• Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: "Listen to my song, and you need never forge a golden mask to return to me."

name: Satyr Grovedancer
oracle_text: When Satyr Grovedancer enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
flavor_text: "Some of my kin dance for themselves, without greater purpose. Nylea gives me purpose, and with it strength."

name: Setessan Tactics
oracle_text: Strive — Setessan Tactics costs {G} more to cast for each target beyond the first.
Until end of turn, any number of target creatures each get +1/+1 and gain "{T}: This creature fights another target creature."

name: Solidarity of Heroes
oracle_text: Strive — Solidarity of Heroes costs {1}{G} more to cast for each target beyond the first.
Choose any number of target creatures. Double the number of +1/+1 counters on each of them.

name: Spirespine
oracle_text: Bestow {4}{G} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)
Spirespine blocks each turn if able.
Enchanted creature gets +4/+1 and blocks each turn if able.

name: Strength from the Fallen
oracle_text: Constellation — Whenever Strength from the Fallen or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

name: Swarmborn Giant
oracle_text: When you're dealt combat damage, sacrifice Swarmborn Giant.
{4}{G}{G}: Monstrosity 2. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put two +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)
As long as Swarmborn Giant is monstrous, it has reach.

name: Ajani, Mentor of Heroes
oracle_text: +1: Distribute three +1/+1 counters among one, two, or three target creatures you control.

+1: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal an Aura, creature, or planeswalker card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
−8: You gain 100 life.

name: Athreos, God of Passage
oracle_text: Indestructible
As long as your devotion to white and black is less than seven, Athreos isn't a creature.
Whenever another creature you own dies, return it to your hand unless target opponent pays 3 life.

name: Desperate Stand
oracle_text: Strive — Desperate Stand costs {R}{W} more to cast for each target beyond the first.
Any number of target creatures each get +2/+0 and gain first strike and vigilance until end of turn.
flavor_text: At the Akroan gates, hoplites revived the tactics of Kytheon Iora's infamous irregulars.

name: Disciple of Deceit
oracle_text: Inspired — Whenever Disciple of Deceit becomes untapped, you may discard a nonland card. If you do, search your library for a card with the same converted mana cost as that card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

name: Fleetfeather Cockatrice
oracle_text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Flying, deathtouch
{5}{G}{U}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)

name: Iroas, God of Victory
oracle_text: Indestructible
As long as your devotion to red and white is less than seven, Iroas isn't a creature.
Creatures you control have menace. (They can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to attacking creatures you control.

name: Keranos, God of Storms
oracle_text: Indestructible
As long as your devotion to blue and red is less than seven, Keranos isn't a creature.

Reveal the first card you draw on each of your turns. Whenever you reveal a land card this way, draw a card. Whenever you reveal a nonland card this way, Keranos deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

name: Kruphix, God of Horizons
oracle_text: Indestructible
As long as your devotion to green and blue is less than seven, Kruphix isn't a creature.
You have no maximum hand size.
If unused mana would empty from your mana pool, that mana becomes colorless instead.

name: Nyx Weaver
oracle_text: Reach
At the beginning of your upkeep, put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.
{1}{B}{G}, Exile Nyx Weaver: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Pharika, God of Affliction
oracle_text: Indestructible
As long as your devotion to black and green is less than seven, Pharika isn't a creature.
{B}{G}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Its owner puts a 1/1 black and green Snake enchantment creature token with deathtouch onto the battlefield.

name: Revel of the Fallen God
oracle_text: Put four 2/2 red and green Satyr creature tokens with haste onto the battlefield.
flavor_text:
"Xenagos has fallen, and the world grows dark without him. What can ever fill that darkness but our rage?"
—Guruthes, disciple of Xenagos

name: Stormchaser Chimera
oracle_text: Flying

{2}{U}{R}: Scry 1, then reveal the top card of your library. Stormchaser Chimera gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that card's converted mana cost. (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

name: Underworld Coinsmith
oracle_text: Constellation — Whenever Underworld Coinsmith or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.
{W}{B}, Pay 1 life: Each opponent loses 1 life.
flavor_text: Coins of the Underworld are shaped from clay funerary masks.

name: Armory of Iroas
oracle_text: Whenever equipped creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Equip {2}
flavor_text: From a distance the weapons look pristine, but in fact they are tarnished and dented, each as unique as the champion who carried it to battle.

name: Chariot of Victory
oracle_text: Equipped creature has first strike, trample, and haste.
Equip {1}
flavor_text: The greatest heroes are the first to stand, the first to take up arms, and the first to meet the enemy.

name: Deserter's Quarters
oracle_text: You may choose not to untap Deserter's Quarters during your untap step.
{6}, {T}: Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as Deserter's Quarters remains tapped.
flavor_text: In Akros, the penalty for running from battle is one night's stay in the Deserter's Quarters.

name: Gold-Forged Sentinel
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: Blessed by the gods. Coveted by mortals. Beholden to neither.

name: Hall of Triumph
oracle_text: As Hall of Triumph enters the battlefield, choose a color.
Creatures you control of the chosen color get +1/+1.
flavor_text: Heroes act without thought of glory or reward. Accolades are a consequence, not a goal.

name: Mana Confluence
oracle_text: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
flavor_text: Five rivers encircle Theros, flowing with waters more ancient than the world itself.

name: Temple of Epiphany
oracle_text: Temple of Epiphany enters the battlefield tapped.
When Temple of Epiphany enters the battlefield, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
{T}: Add {U} or {R} to your mana pool.

name: Temple of Malady
oracle_text: Temple of Malady enters the battlefield tapped.
When Temple of Malady enters the battlefield, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
{T}: Add {B} or {G} to your mana pool.
